about_the_game:
If you encounter any bugs or want to share your feedback, join our Discord channel. We will be happy to hear your thoughts on the demo to make our game even better!

Content Overview for the Demo Version:

What you will see in the Demo is only a small part of what you can expect from the full version of the game. In 20-30 minutes of gameplay you will be able to feel the overall atmosphere of Chorus of Carcosa. You will try out some of the mechanics and meet several inhabitants of the 'eerie house'.

In addition, the game’s content is still in development and more will be added. Chorus of Carcosa is set to be released next year. The gates of madness are opening soon...

Dive into the world of mysticism and madness

'Chorus of Carcosa' is a single-player psychological horror about an anxious solitary sculptor. One night, when a blood-soaked neighbor knocks on his door, he is forced to abandon his place of comfort. The story is heavily inspired by the iconic book 'The King in Yellow' by R. W. Chambers and adapts its plunge into madness into a first-person survival video game.

Experience the fear of facing the unknown

Survive in the old ever-changing apartment building filled with dangers and mysteries. Escape the unknown mystical monsters and lunatic neighbors by pushing through paralyzing fear and psychosis.

Solve the mystery of an alternate reality

Experience the ‘Carcosa’ — an altered reality that can invade the space around you. Are all these changes real? Or are they merely hallucination-induced nightmares?

Explore the chilling atmosphere of an odd dystopian world

Immerse yourself in the terrifying labyrinths of the strange building, meticulously created with Unreal Engine 5. Stunning graphics and high-quality 3D sound will make you dissolve in the atmosphere of disturbing fear.

content_descriptors.notes: Chorus of Carcosa contains sensitive material that some players may find disturbing or triggering. The game includes violent and profane language, depictions of psychosis, insanity, mental breakdowns, psychiatric drugs, aggression, brutality and violence, blood and blood-like fluids, serious physical mutilation, murder, self-harm and suicide. There are frightening images of animals and insects, humanoid creatures, altered human body parts, fire, sound and visual hallucinations, enclosed spaces, situations of being locked up and being chased.

short_description: Chorus of Carcosa is a psychological horror game inspired by the iconic book 'The King in Yellow' by R. W. Chambers. Test the limits of your mind and survive in the old, ever-changing building. Just don't get lost in the dark, twisted labyrinths... or in your own madness.
